maxIndex

public static int maxIndex(double[] values,
                           cern.jet.random.Uniform distribution)
finds the index of the maximal entry in an array. If multiple maximal entries exist, one of them is returned randomly.

Parameters:
values - the array
distribution - a Uniform distribution
Returns:
the index of the maximal entry

maxIndex_slow

                                   cern.jet.random.Uniform distribution)

maxIndex

public static int maxIndex(double[] values,
                           cern.jet.random.Uniform distribution,
                           NumberComparator comparator)
finds the index of the maximal entry in an array. If multiple maximal entries exist, one of them is returned randomly.

Parameters:
values - the array
distribution - a Uniform distribution
comparator - a utility that does the actual comparison and may or may not allow certain degree of rounding error.
Returns:
the index of the maximal entry

maxIndex_slow

                                   cern.jet.random.Uniform distribution,
                                   NumberComparator comparator)
TODO: If a certain degree of rounding error allows, more complex algorithm is needed to avoid problems. The current implementation may lead to an accumulation of unequal values one within the rounding error distance from another.

Parameters:
values -
distribution -
comparator -
Returns:
the index of the maximal entry
